ValidationRule.description: If a rep trys to sell Webinar products on a deal that is not UpSell and was created after 4/1/20 then they will be blocked, they must sell Collab or Webcast products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Product_MRR_Total_Webinar__c >= 1.00 || Product_NRR_Total_Webinar__c >= 1.00, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE (2020,04,01), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Deal_Type__c,"Up-Sell (Rev Increase)")), RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PGi's Webinar Products are not allowed to be sold anymore for new business deals, please select a Webcast or Collaboration product instead.
